text: Bernhard Germeshausen (21 August 1951 â€“ 15 April 2022) was an East German bobsledder. He competed from the mid-1970s to the early 1980s. He took part in two Winter Olympics, he won four medals with three golds (Two-man: 1976, Four- man: 1976, 1980) and one silver (Two-man: 1980). ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Olympic bronze medalists for East Germany Category:Olympic silver medalists for East Germany Category:Competitors at the 1976 Winter Olympics Category:German bobsledders
title: Bernhard Germeshausen
